parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From apo and lambano; to receive; also to take aside.
From kleronomos; heirship, i.e. a patrimony or a possession.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A reward, recompense. From antapodidomi; requital.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To be a slave, be subject to, obey, be devoted. From doulos; to be a slave to.
